column1:
function aasort (&$array, $key) {
    				$sorter=array();
    				$ret=array();
    				reset($array);
    				foreach ($array as $ii => $va) {
    					$sorter[$ii]=$va[$key];
    				}
    				asort($sorter);
    				foreach ($sorter as $ii => $va) {
    					$ret[$ii]=$array[$ii];
    				}
    				$array=$ret;
    			}
